pull.title: refactor: Fix timedata includes
pull.body: Remove unused includes. Also, fixup comments, see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28956/files#r1464827885. Also, add missing includes to `chain.h` while touching it.

comments.body:
nit: iwyu suggests

```
chain.h should add these lines:
namespace Consensus { struct Params; }

chain.h should remove these lines:
- #include <consensus/params.h>  // lines 10-10
```
Going to leave removal of further includes to a follow-up
